Name: Moshcave
About the game: Moshcave is a action roguelite game with infinite and procedurally generated dungeons, where enemies gets progressively stronger as you advance into the caves. Help Murphy by powering him up to get to the lowest floor possible of the Cave of Mr. Mosh! Main features: > Infinite, procedurally generated dungeons; > Powerups; > Different hats, weapons and pets with various stats; > Dozens of possible builds; > Enemies and floor count.
